articles.title: Name of veteran Hells Angels member appears on Montreal-area tombstone
articles.description: The name of a veteran Hells Angels member has appeared on a new tombstone showcasing the logo of the outlaw biker gang at a parish cemetery on Montreal’s South Shore.
